io.sarl.core

Interface ExternalContextAccess

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Capacity

    public interface ExternalContextAccess
extends Capacity

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getAllContexts

        SynchronizedCollection<AgentContext> getAllContexts()
        Replies all contexts this agent is a member of, including the default context

      • getContext

        AgentContext getContext(UUID contextID)
        Replies the AgentContext for the given ID. The agent must have joined the context before calling this action or use its parentContextID
        Parameters:
        contextID - the ID of the context to get.
        Throws:
        UnknownContextException - if the context specified context is not known by the agent.

      • join

        void join(UUID contextID,
        UUID expectedDefaultSpaceID)
        Joins a new parent context (a new super holon).

        The agent will be involved in the context with the ID given by contextID. The parameter expectedDefaultSpaceID is only used to check if the caller of this function knows the ID of the default space in the context to be involved in. Note that the context must already exists, and the default space inside this context must have the sams ID as expectedDefaultSpaceID. If the given expectedDefaultSpaceID does not match the ID of the default space in the context contextID, then the access to the context is forbidden.

        This actions registers the agent in the default Space of the context with the ID contextID. .

      • leave

        void leave(UUID contextID)
        Leaves the parent's context.
